# poetic-minute-6695
 
# LocalEase 

 It is a clone website of Nearbuy, which deals in finding things to eat and buy, book a table at restaurants, spas, gift cards near your location 
# Team Members:
  
  
  Shreshth Kumar,
  Kamal Gupta,
  Sankalp Tiwari,
  Priyanshu Kumar


# Deploy Link-
  
  https://localease.netlify.app/
